name: Rift Runner
description:
Rift Runner is a fast-paced precision platformer built for speedrunning! Shave valuable milliseconds off your time by discovering hidden paths as you deal with falling spikes, icy platforms, crumbling towers and more! Activate the Chrono Echo for the ultimate timed challenge!


Rift Runner is completely free. If we ever add any in-game purchasing, it'll be for cosmetic items only. Paying won't make you any faster, sorry!




Easy to learn but difficult to master, most levels are 15 seconds or less. Discovering hidden paths may help you shave seconds off your best run but most of the time, you'll be racing for milliseconds!




Activate the Chrono Echo to load your best run and compete head to head with the past!




Coming soon!


https://store.steampowered.com/app/1307920/Rift_Runner
